examples.example: 我一直都在努力提升自己，让生活变得更加美好。

translate.english: I have been constantly striving to improve myself to make life more beautiful.

examples.example: 他一直保持着乐观向上的心态，面对困难从不退缩。

translate.english: He always keeps an optimistic and upward mindset and never shrinks back in the face of difficulties.

examples.example: 他一直坚持锻炼，身体越来越健康。

translate.english: He has been insisting on exercising and his body is getting healthier and healthier.
